original_text: And he said, ‘Look up and see that all the male goats mating with the flock are streaked, speckled or spotted, for I have seen all that Laban has been doing to you.
korean_text: 이르시되 네 눈을 들어 보라 양 떼를 탄 숫양은 다 얼룩무늬 있는 것, 점 있는 것과 아롱진 것이니라 라반이 네게 행한 모든 것을 내가 보았노라

sentences.original_text: that all the male goats mating with the flock
for I have seen all that Laban has been doing to you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 라반이 너에게 행한 모든 것을 보았기 때문이다
